cars.description: For an extra $1M this car will pave its own road to Mars and destroy that road as it makes its journey.
This little guy can get in and out of turns like it was being chased by a fat hick with a belt made from his daddy's lucky rabbit's feet.
Occoasionally the gear shift gets stuck in park, especially in the winter, but with juuuust the right amount of jiggling, it will pop out and you're good to GO!
Feeling less like a man? Buy this fucking truck.
Bad guys are bad. Make them feel bad by rolling up in this whip.
